Name: Rogue Warlords
About the game: Warlords, massive godly constructs, have been set free upon an uninhabited island in order to do battle. Summoning troops, and emboldening them with upgrades, the last warlord left standing will be recognized as the strongest by the gods. Instant Action - Start each game with an army at the ready. Fast Matches - Start specializing your army from the first second and evolve rapidly. Sandbox Mode - Customize nearly every aspect of the game and create wild battles. Constant Combat - Battles are continuously happening. Summon units at a moments notice to reinforce your lines. Units - Purchase and summon units that will add upgrades to your pool of purchasable upgrades. Cleverly manage your pool to strengthen specific abilities, or get a little bit of everything. Upgrades - Purchase from a wide variety of upgrades to strengthen your army. Combos - Find clever combinations of upgrades to create an overpowered army. Replayability - A large number of unit types and upgrades to ensure no two games are exactly the same.
